import React from "react"; const Rating = ({ value, text }) => { return ( <>
= 1 ? "fas fa-star" : value >= 0.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } aria-hidden='true'> = 2 ? "fas fa-star" : value >= 1.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } aria-hidden='true'> = 3 ? "fas fa-star" : value >= 2.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } aria-hidden='true'> = 4 ? "fas fa-star" : value >= 3.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } aria-hidden='true'> = 5 ? "fas fa-star" : value >= 4.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } aria-hidden='true'> {text && text}
); }; export default Rating;
